alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 09 at 4:00AM EST until January 09 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate overwash will be likely along oceanside facing seawalls and bulkheads through today, along with minor coastal flooding, similar to a king tide, across low-lying oceanside areas. Minor coastal flooding, also similar to a king tide, will be possible across low-lying areas on the Gulf side this evening.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Be aware of possible wave overwash onto exposed oceanside roadways through today.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
